column4: Hey there, having some trouble strting my wireless card on ubuntu, the drivers are there but it's not letting me select any wireless networks, nor is it allowing me to see the wireless network tab when i click on networks at the top bar, any help?
not on the PC i am writing from, other PC has no access to wireless..  any specific line you are looking for?
yes, the line where it's requesting the wireless driver to see what firmware it's trying to load.
yes, if it's 'agere_sta_fw.bin' - I have to rename it (to disable) for connection (at reduced rate).
